channel.title: android on Adam Piekarski
channel.description: Recent content in android on Adam Piekarski

item.title: Eardentity
item.description: An Android ear identification app Using the ear as a biometric Link to heading Much of society strives to construct an unique and individual personality and some radically change their physical appearance so choosing a robust biometric to identify a human can be a challenge. Finger tips, iris, gait, face among others have been tried, tested and successfully rolled out - each with their own advantages and disadvantages. In recent years the ear has emerged as a potentially useful biometric to suppliment existing solutions.

item.title: Piggy Fly
item.description: A fast-paced casual Android game cough Flappy Bird clone cough When will pigs fly? Now. Link to heading The backdrop Link to heading During the explosion of the Flappy Bird frenzy and consequent demise, I decided to make a clone. The famous adynaton became a reality: Piggy Fly was born. Gameplay Link to heading There’s not much to say here - you touch the screen; the pig flies. The physics is even more annoying than Flappy Bird’s, so I wish you the best of luck!
